main event: A witness reported observing a bright, circular object in the sky over Santa Ana, California, on August 7, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as circular, approximately 40-50 feet in diameter, and had a bright red-orange color., The object hovered over a residential area for about 10-15 minutes before quickly accelerating and disappearing from sight., Multiple photographs were taken of the object, but analysis indicated potential hoax due to the lack of specific visual conditions., The investigation involved conversations with local military personnel, indicating high interest in unidentified aerial phenomena., The sighting led to investigations by both the Air Force and local authorities, confirming multiple witnesses.
witness description: The witness is a resident of Santa Ana with no prior knowledge of UFOs.
